title: News App
description: Built a responsive news app using React.js, fetching data from a third-party API to display real-time updates on sports, entertainment, and health. Implemented state management using React hooks

title: Inotebook
description: Created a responsive note-taking app using the MERN stack. Implemented secure login with JWT and added features for creating, editing, and deleting notes. Used React Context API for state management.

title: TicTacToe Game
description: Tic-Tac-Toe a classic paper-pencil game played between two players, typically using 3x3 grid, using HTML, CSS, Javascript.

title: Vedriti Pharmacy
description: Created secure and robust RESTful APIs to manage user data, orders, inventory and complex business logic across five different user roles. Implemented JWT authentication and Firebase integration for real-time updates and notifications.

title: HRMS Engineers Hut
description: Developed comprehensive RESTful APIs for user management with role-based access control (Admin, Management, User). Constructed reusable UI components in Next.js and implemented seamless API integration for efficient data flow between frontend and backend services.

title: Jorshor Music App
description: Developed comprehensive RESTful APIs for a music streaming platform with multi-tier user management system. Implemented secure authentication and authorization ensuring different user roles (Super Admin, Admin, White Label, Producer, Artist, User) had access only to authorized data and endpoints.
